report.title: Get my square that have plots
report.description: Get a list of core Squares and additional squares that have been assigned to the user and also have at least one plot assigned to the square.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations square LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=square.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_id=square.id AND lav.location_attribute_id = #vice_county_location_attribute_id# JOIN locations plot on plot.parent_id=square.id AND plot.deleted=false JOIN users u on u.id=#current_user_id# JOIN person_attribute_values pavOthers on pavOthers.int_value=square.id AND pavOthers.person_attribute_id=#user_square_attr_id# AND pavOthers.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pav on pav.int_value=square.id AND pav.person_id=u.person_id AND pav.person_attribute_id=#user_square_attr_id# AND pav.deleted=false WHERE (square.location_type_id=#core_square_location_type_id# OR square.location_type_id=#additional_square_location_type_id#) AND #website_filter# AND square.deleted=false #filters# GROUP BY square.id,lav.text_value,plot.created_by_id HAVING (plot.created_by_id=#current_user_id# OR count(distinct pavOthers.id) < 2)

param.name: current_user_id
param.display: Id of the currently logged in user

param.name: no_vice_county_found_message
param.display: Some words to use in the square's name if a vice county cannot be found.

param.name: vice_county_location_attribute_id
param.display: The location attribute id that hold's the Vice County name.

param.name: pss_mode
param.display: Is the page running on the NPMS (PSS) system rather than splash. On NPMS we also don't show squares which users have assigned to themselves until the allocation is approved.

param.name: user_square_attr_id
param.description: Id of the person attribute that holds user squares

column.name: name
column.sql: case when #pss_mode#=1 then square.centroid_sref else square.centroid_sref || ' - ' || coalesce(lav.text_value,'#no_vice_county_found_message#') end
